questions.question: How much chocolate was in the chocolate room?

choices.answer: enough to fill every bathtub & swimming pool in the country

questions.question: What did the Oompa-Loompas look like?

choices.answer: tall and skinny with green skin
short and fat with eyes that glowed in the dark
one foot tall with enormous heads
knee high with funny long hair

questions.question: Where did Willy Wonka take everyone first?
Who were the little people on the other side of the chocolate river?
What was in the chocolate room?

choices.answer: a river and waterfall made out of chocolate
a door to the taffy room

questions.question: Why are the biggest rooms in the chocolate factory underground?

choices.answer: The factory is too little, so it's the only place to grow.
They are cooler so the chocolate won't melt.
It keeps people from finding them.

questions.question: Who was the owner of the chocolate factory?
What did Willy Wonka look like?

choices.answer: average-sized; black & white suit; cane with carved snake
little man; black top hat; plum tail coat; green pants; cane
tall; thin; wizard's hat; red cape; yellow & black shirt
large; fat; polka dotted pants; shirt with brass buttons
